title: HOUR 2 - NCAAFB, Panthers, Bears, Niners

description:
College football preview with Joel Klatt

Should the Panthers stick with Sam Darnold?

Justin Fields play so far in Chicago

The Bears-49ers game will be interesting


Guests: Joel Klatt, Mark Schlereth
